name: Rabbeaux Knight
description:
** == What is Rabbeaux Knight? == **

Rabbeaux Knight is a WIP concept for a fast-paced 4 player online party-arena game that started off as a student project. You controll a bomb-laying rabbit with a grappling hook. Since this game runs on PHONTON PUN 2, you do not need a local connection for players, this works flawlessly online. 

** == CONTROLS== **

W,A,S,D - Walk
F - Kick Bomb (reaches 3 blocks distance)
Mouse 1 - Use Grappling hook, aim with your mouse

IMPORTANT:
Bombs do NOT spawn under you, they spawn in front of you.
As part of a game design decision, you can kick bombs immediately after spawning them which is a tactical advantage. This game is focused on combat and dodging abilities. Get as many powerups as possible and dominate the field.
